stories.text:
Job Posting: https://jobs.lever.co/FeedMedia/ccedd776-f862-45d1-b57f-fdba3065f43a

TL:DR: Remote Engineer with AWS, GraphQL, and Node.js experience. Front end built in React.js

Salary: Budget is over the 100K mark, waiting to hear back from the company on confirmation of that.

Client Notes: Really neat business model, and a team of people that actually give a shit about each other and contributing to the product. Definitely would like to work with people interested in music, and are part of other communities and advocacy. If you're interested, I suggest checking out the founder's posts on Linkedin, to get a sense of the team.

Notes: I am a recruiting consultant that is working with the client, I don't think this breaks any posting rules but happy to change/remove if so! If you apply, please DM so I can let the client know. I'm not commission-based, and the team I work with is focused on culture fit, and D&I. I'm actually in love with our team, it's great to work with people that want to kill the bad name of 'recruiter'. Happy to answer any questions.
